statements: SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, department_id FROM patients WHERE length_of_stay > 5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT patient_name, length_of_stay FROM patients ORDER BY length_of_stay DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department_id FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, length_of_stay ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY length_of_stay DESC;
SELECT AVG(length_of_stay) AS avg_length_of_stay, department_id FROM patients GROUP BY department_id HAVING AVG(length_of_stay) > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, department_id FROM patients GROUP BY department_id ORDER BY total_patients DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, length_of_stay FROM patients WHERE length_of_stay > 7 ORDER BY length_of_stay DESC, patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM departments;
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE length_of_stay > 5;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE department_id = 2 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT department_name FROM departments WHERE department_id = 2 ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, length_of_stay FROM patients WHERE department_id = 3 AND length_of_stay > 5;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE department_id = 1 ORDER BY length_of_stay ASC;
SELECT patient_name, department_name FROM patients JOIN departments ON patients.department_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE length_of_stay_days > 5;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY length_of_stay_days DESC;
SELECT pv.visit_id, p.patient_name, d.department_name, pv.visit_date FROM patient_visits pv JOIN patients p ON pv.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN departments d ON pv.department_id = d.department_id;
SELECT p.patient_name, d.department_name FROM patients p JOIN departments d ON p.department_id = d.department_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT patient_name, length_of_stay_days FROM patients WHERE length_of_stay_days > 3 ORDER BY length_of_stay_days DESC;
SELECT patients.patient_name, departments.department_name FROM patients JOIN departments ON patients.department_id = departments.department_id;

SELECT patient_visits.visit_id, patients.patient_name, departments.department_name, patient_visits.visit_date FROM patient_visits JOIN patients ON patient_visits.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN departments ON patient_visits.department_id = departments.department_id WHERE patient_visits.visit_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT patients.patient_id, patients.patient_name, COUNT(patient_visits.visit_id) AS total_visits FROM patients LEFT JOIN patient_visits ON patients.patient_id = patient_visits.patient_id GROUP BY patients.patient_id, patients.patient_name ORDER BY total_visits DESC;
SELECT * FROM departments;
SELECT department_name, department_id FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, visit_date FROM patients JOIN visits ON patients.patient_id = visits.patient_id;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM patients JOIN departments ON patients.department_id = departments.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE department_id = 3 AND patient_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT patients.patient_name, departments.department_name FROM patients LEFT JOIN departments ON patients.department_id = departments.department_id WHERE patients.patient_id = 1;
SELECT patients.patient_name, visits.visit_date FROM patients INNER JOIN visits ON patients.patient_id = visits.patient_id WHERE visits.visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT patients.patient_name, stay_length.length_of_stay FROM patients INNER JOIN stay_length ON patients.patient_id = stay_length.patient_id WHERE stay_length.length_of_stay > 5 ORDER BY stay_length.length_of_stay DESC, patients.patient_name ASC;

SELECT departments.department_name, COUNT(patients.patient_id) AS patient_count FROM departments LEFT JOIN patients ON departments.department_id = patients.department_id GROUP BY departments.department_name HAVING COUNT(patients.patient_id) > 10 ORDER BY patient_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, department_id FROM Patients WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM StayRecords ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT department_id, avg_length_of_stay FROM DepartmentAvgStay WHERE avg_length_of_stay > 5.0;
SELECT department_name, total_stays, total_days_decimal FROM Departments JOIN StayStatistics ON Departments.department_id = StayStatistics.department_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, check_in_date FROM Patients WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT department_name FROM Departments WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(avg_length_of_stay) AS average_stay FROM DepartmentAvgStay;
SELECT department_id, total_stays FROM StayStatistics WHERE total_days_decimal > 100 ORDER BY total_stays DESC;
